Wright, Frank Lloyd (American architect, 1867-1959) [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Interior view of altar and seating

"This building is generally regarded as Wright's most noted work at FSC. Completed in 1941, it commands center stage on campus reflecting the college's religious affiliation, and the fact that Wright was a Methodist himself." --http://www.franklloydwrightatfsc.com/FSC-FLW%20Doc%20-%20Early%20Years.htm [work]
